shencangsheng/easy_db

query CSV, JSON, xlsx, and more with SQL in Rust

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Rust-based query engine for analytics, supports SQL, DataFrame, and multiple formats
  • embedded NoSQL database with MongoDB-like API in Rust
  • Query JSON, CSV, Parquet files and databases with SQL, even join between them
  • Toy database implemented in Rust
  • SQLite-compatible database engine in Rust with async, vector search, and cloud sync
  • Query language for JSON-like structures
  • brie-tree for efficient data structure operations in Rust
  • SQL query engine for files, databases, apps, LLMs
  • Database management tool built with Tauri and Rust
